verses.name: Proverbs 6:1
verses.text: My son, if thou be surety for thy friend, if thou hast stricken thy hand with a stranger,

verses.name: Proverbs 6:2
verses.text: Thou art snared with the words of thy mouth, thou art taken with the words of thy mouth.

verses.name: Proverbs 6:3
verses.text: Do this now, my son, and deliver thyself, when thou art come into the hand of thy friend; go, humble thyself, and make sure thy friend.

verses.name: Proverbs 6:4
verses.text: Give not sleep to thine eyes, nor slumber to thine eyelids.

verses.name: Proverbs 6:5
verses.text: Deliver thyself as a roe from the hand of the hunter, and as a bird from the hand of the fowler.
